abstract: Expecting the deal to be rejected, another suitor, Validus, is increasing its pressure on Transatlantic directors. A third suitor, National Indemnity, meanwhile, is maintaining a silence.
snippet: Expecting the deal to be rejected, another suitor, Validus, is increasing its pressure on Transatlantic directors. A third suitor, National Indemnity, meanwhile, is maintaining a silence.
lead_paragraph: Time is running out on Transatlantic Holdings’ attempt to merge with Allied World Assurance.

headline.main: Transatlantic Suitors Wait for Allied Deal to Slip Away
